alert.note: Alert for Castro; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 11:45PM CDT until May 25 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Hale County in northwestern Texas... South central Castro County in the Panhandle of Texas... Lamb County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1145 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Hart to 5 miles southwest of Amherst, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Olton, Anton, Amherst, Cotton Center, Fieldton, Spade, Whitharral and Springlake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
